import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../../components/Product/Rating' import axios from "axios" import '../../index.css' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`); setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, [match]); return ( <>
